about.description:
Tucked away in the hills between downtown Los Angeles and Pasadena, you will experience a comfortable lifestyle at an affordable price with your new home, Huntington Hacienda II Apartment Homes. Your commute is made easy with close access to the 110 Freeway, putting you mere minutes from downtown. Huntington Hacienda II is a lovely, affordable community participating in the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) Low-Income Housing Tax Credit (LIHTC) program. 
Our one, two, three, and four-bedroom affordable apartments in East Los Angeles appeal to the most selective residents. Entertain family and friends in your open-concept kitchen/living area and private patio or balcony. Residents enjoy convenient amenities including controlled gated access, on-site laundry centers, an adventure playground, off-street covered parking and 24-hour maintenance.

ABOUT FIGUEROA STREET APARTMENTS

The Figueroa Street Apartments offers a quiet residential life only twenty minutes from Downtown LA (DTLA). Spend the day at the nearby Watts Towers Arts Center, a California Landmark built over the span of 30 years by Simon Rodia from 1920's to late 50's. Live the good life by taking advantage of nearby regional employment centers like LAX Airport / Inglewood, Vernon, DTLA, Hawthorne, Gardena, & Downey. With just a quick hop onto the 110 and 105 freeways all of LA is yours to explore!

It is also easy to get around this place by public transportation, just steps from the Broadway / 104th bus # 45 stop with service to DTLA or to the Green Metro Line to LAX. DTLA is only 15-20 minutes by car, this is a great central location for getting to where you want to go in LA!

Approval is based on income (must show proof of income at least twice the monthly rent), rental history, criminal background. NO evictions. Credit scores are not as important as these other factors in evaluating applications. about.description: Mirage Town Homes II is affordable townhouse style apartments, for very low to low income household families. It consists of 21 duplex units stacked (11-3 bedroom three bathroom townhouses, over 1,138 square feet each and 10-four bedroom three bathroom townhouses, over 1,138 square feet each), which gives total of 4-story residential structure with one level gated, covered, remote accessible underground parking structure for 36 automobiles and 3 temporary bicycle parking at front of the building as well as other bicycle parking with work area at north-west corner of building on the third floor. Vehicular access to the underground parking is from back alley, which makes ingress and egress of automobiles much easier and safe from busy Western Avenue. The residential units are designed around a courtyard in order to bring an open, quiet and secure entrance to the first level of duplexes. One elevator and stairwell provide access to the main building and upper floors of housing, including the underground parking level. The Western Avenue side of the development has telephone entry/intercom security system that lead to the central courtyard and entrance of the duplex. Adequate central laundry facilities with energy star rated washers and dryers are available for the conveniences of all residents. An abundance of light and fresh air ventilation is provided by generous window space and various units have private balconies. All units are two levels with emphasis to give and feel the best home like environment in the urban setting. All spaces are well defined for their purpose with ease of transition from one functional area to other. Each unit is furnished with fluorescent light fixtures, flow restrictors for faucets, ample closet space, central heating and air conditioning, and approved window coverings. Kitchen is furnished with a double-sink, garbage disposal, dishwasher, ample, well design, sturdy and functional cabinets, gas stove/range with approved hood and frost-free refrigerator. All kitchen range hoods are vented to the outside air of the building. Appliances are energy-efficient, with the energy star rating. Units are well insulated to minimize loss of hot and cold air. about.description:
Venice Way Apartments - 745 Venice Way, Inglewood, CA 90302

Unit Description
The units at 745 Venice Way offer a blend of comfort and modernity. Each unit features spacious floor plans with one bedroom and one bathroom, providing ample living space. The interiors boast hardwood floors that add a touch of elegance and ease of maintenance, while large windows ensure plenty of natural light throughout the day. The kitchens come equipped with sturdy counter tops, a gas stove, and abundant cabinet space, making meal prep a breeze. Ceiling fans are installed for added comfort, and the bathrooms feature updated fixtures with a clean, modern design. The units are designed to maximize convenience and practicality.

Property Amenities
The property at 745 Venice Way is designed with a variety of amenities that enhance the lifestyle of its residents. A well-maintained swimming pool provides a perfect spot for relaxation and socializing during warm days. The on-site parking facilities ensure that residents have a hassle-free parking experience, and the landscaped walkways between the buildings offer a pleasant, serene environment. The property's layout includes a blend of greenery and paved areas, creating a balanced aesthetic that is both inviting and functional. The overall atmosphere of the property is calm and welcoming, making it an ideal home for those seeking a blend of comfort and convenience.

Neighborhood Description
Located in the vibrant area of Inglewood, 745 Venice Way is surrounded by numerous amenities. The neighborhood is well-connected, with easy access to public transportation options that facilitate commuting to various parts of Los Angeles. Nearby parks offer green spaces for recreation and relaxation, while a variety of shopping centers and dining options are just a short drive away. The area also hosts several healthcare facilities and schools, ensuring that all essential services are within reach. Inglewood's lively atmosphere and cultural diversity make it a dynamic place to live.

Welcome to Venice Way Apartments at 745 Venice Way, Inglewood, CA 90302 - where modern living meets comfort in the heart of Southern California. Our spacious one-bedroom, one-bathroom units are designed with hardwood floors, ample natural light, and contemporary fixtures. Enjoy cooking in kitchens equipped with gas stoves and plenty of cabinet space, and relax in stylish bathrooms featuring modern amenities.

Our property boasts a variety of features to enhance your living experience. Take a dip in the inviting swimming pool, stroll through the beautifully landscaped walkways, or enjoy the convenience of on-site parking. The serene and well-maintained environment of our community provides a perfect balance between tranquility and functionality. 745-747 Venice Way is an apartment community located in Los Angeles County and the 90302 ZIP Code.
